ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Verant Bats .000 for bards as usual
ygData.msgSnippet: Not too add its the class they have problems with after the majority of major patches.  You think that they would learn to double check you guys. Mu 58
ygData.messageBody:
Not too add its the class they have problems with after the majority of
major patches. You think that they would learn to double check you guys.

Mu
58 Enchanter
Tunare Server

-----Original Message-----
From: Daniel Sniderman [mailto:fuzzbone@...]
Sent: Wednesday, December 05, 2001 2:29 AM
To: EQ Bards
Subject: [eqbards] Verant Bats .000 for bards as usual


After waiting all day for servers to come up - and all night for patch to
work - I log into the "New and Improved" game to discover that bard songs
are basically 99 pct broken. You'll sing songs and every 30 minutes or so -
you'll get about 3 ticks of the song - then it will stop working again.

Nice testing Verant. A few glitches on release - okay I can live with
that - but completely breaking one of the classes - Way to go!

Slyde
